org.apache.ctakes.relationextractor.ae.features

Class WordNetUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ctakes.relationextractor.ae.features.WordNetUtils

  • public class WordNetUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a wrapper for the MIT WordNet inteface that simplifies basic operations such as retrieving synonyms and hypernyms for a word.

    • Field Summary
